actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to prohibit travel at Government expense outside the United States by Members of Congress who after the adjournment sine die of the last session of a Congress are not candidates for reelection in the next Congress.

summary.text: Prohibits travel at Government expense outside the United States by Members of Congress after adjournment sine die of the last session of a Congress if such Member is not a candidate for reelection in the next Congress or a Presidential nominee for some other Office of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit travel at Government expense outside the United States by Members of Congress who after the adjournment sine die of the last session of a Congress are not candidates for reelection in the next Congress.
